title: Crescentia alata
Parts of plant used: Whole plant, fruits, seeds, flowers, leaves, stem and root
Therapeutic uses: The fruit is pectoral. The pulp is used particularly in the treatment of colds, and for diseases of the kidneys, A decoction of the leaves is employed as an astringent and antihemorrhagic. It is much used in the treatment of haemoptysis and dysentery.
